title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.9 - Transportation of radioactive materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.9 - Transportation of radioactive materials

State Regulations

The transportation of atomic nuclear fission or radioactive
materials of any kind or description across the bridge or its approaches is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
302.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
